SIZE - Class in com.myftpserver.command
 
SIZE() - Constructor for class com.myftpserver.command.SIZE
The FTP command, SIZE OF FILE (SIZE), is used to obtain the transfer size of a file from the server-FTP process.
For detail information about SIZE command,please refer RFC 3659

STAT - Class in com.myftpserver.command
 
STAT() - Constructor for class com.myftpserver.command.STAT
This command shall cause a status response to be sent over the control connection in the form of a reply.
For detail information about STAT command,please refer RFC 959

STOR - Class in com.myftpserver.command
 
STOR() - Constructor for class com.myftpserver.command.STOR
This command causes the server-DTP to accept the data transferred via the data connection and to store the data as a file at the server site.
For detail information about STOR command,please refer RFC 959

SYST - Class in com.myftpserver.command
 
SYST() - Constructor for class com.myftpserver.command.SYST
This command is used to find out the type of operating system at the server.
For detail information about STRU command,please refer RFC 959
